introduction.text:
My name is David Ko
I have been cooking professionally for over 10 years,
but I have decided to do a career change.

I have been learning web development and focuses on front-end for over 2 years,
and I feel there are many similarity between Programming and Cooking,
both of them require attention to details, patients, and the willingness to be self-taught.
I found the same joys and struggles between programming and cooking, but the result is always rewarding.

techstack.text:
Javascript, Typescript, React, NextJs, 
ExpressJs, Knex, Jest
Postgresql, CI/CD
Git
